title: Actors Chris and Mark in a New Movie
summary: Chris Hemsworth and Mark Ruffalo are famous actors who have been in superhero movies together. Now they are in a new film called Crime 101, which is a thriller about a thief and a detective. In the movie, Chris plays a jewel thief, and Mark plays a detective trying to catch him. They are good friends and like to have fun on set, but this movie is more serious than their past ones. They had to work hard to act in a dramatic way instead of being funny. They have wanted to make a movie together outside of superhero films for a long time, and Chris asked Mark to join this project. The film shows them in new roles that are different from what fans usually see.
